meanings.definition: Of or relating to a province.
meanings.sent1: The small town had a provincial charm that was comforting.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the provincial lifestyle over the hustle and bustle of the city.
meanings.sent3: The provincial decorations at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His provincial mindset limited his understanding of the world.
meanings.sent5: The provincial landscape was dotted with colorful flowers and rolling hills.

meanings.sent1: The provincials brought a different perspective to the city.
meanings.sent2: She met a group of provincials at the market selling fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The provincials were amazed by the tall buildings in the city.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a provincial in the bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The provincials shared stories of their hometown with enthusiasm.
